    • 方法详细资料

      • encapsulateHeader

        public static java.lang.String encapsulateHeader(int header)
        Method to encapsulate the messaage header.
        参数:
        header - The int header value.
        返回:
        The header string tranfered from int.

      • encapsulateContent

        public static java.lang.String encapsulateContent(java.lang.Object content)
                                           throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Method to encapsulate jason string from Object by google gson.
        参数:
        content - The message bean
        返回:
        The jason string
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • composeMessage

        public static byte[] composeMessage(java.lang.String body)
                             throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Method to compose the string body to UTF-8 byte array, ready to put in the socket.
        参数:
        body - The message body string.
        返回:
        The message byte array coded in UTF-8.
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
